Uses of Package
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler

Packages that use com.continuuity.loom.scheduler
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks. 
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs. 
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.scheduler used by com.continuuity.loom.scheduler
Actions.Dependency
          Represents action dependency.
ClusterAction
          Actions that can be performed on a cluster.
ClusterCleanup
          Run cleanup tasks.
ClusterScheduler
          Schedule clusters to be provisioned.
JobScheduler
          Schedules a cluster job.
SolverScheduler
          Polls a queue which contains ClusterRequest and a cluster id, and runs the solver to determine what the cluster layout should be for the specified cluster and cluster request.
 

Classes in com.continuuity.loom.scheduler used by com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task
Actions
          Class describing what ProvisionerActions are only on hardware and not on services, which actions rollback other actions, which actions retry other actions, the order ProvisionerActions should be performed in order to carry out specific ClusterActions, and action dependencies.
ClusterAction
          Actions that can be performed on a cluster.
